channel.title: DANE TLSA (DNS-based Authentication of Named Entities) for whonix.org
channel.description:
Lots of references / notes in the wiki: [DANE TLSA](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/About_Infrastructure#DANE_TLSA)
For now decided not to implement it due to:
* low adaption * no support in major browsers * complex, maintenance demanding setup
